Celectial body parameters:
 Julian Day: The number of days since January 1, 4713 BC
 Right Ascen: The angle (degrees) from the first point of Aries
 House: The house number in which the celestial body is, and the house angle spread
 Zodiac: Element on the zodiac and the location of the celectial body in the element
 
 Aspects grid key:
 0 (conjunction): The celectial bodies are in the same direction
 * (sextile): There is an angle of 60° between the two celectial bodies
 □ (square): There is an angle of 90° between the two celectial bodies
 ∆ (trine): There is an angle of 120° between the two celectial bodies
 / (oposition): There is an angle of 180° between the two celectial bodies
